dialog.panic: Sicela ubike le nkinga ku-Github issue tracker.
dialog.migrate:
Kutholwe ifayela lokumisa lenguqulo endala. Thuthela enguqulweni entsha?
ISEXWAYISO: Lokhu kuzobhala phezu kokumisa kwakho kwamanje uma kukhona
dialog.custom_app_dir_migrate:
Uzosetha uhla lwemibhalo lohlelo lokusebenza olungokwezifiso lube ngu-%{path}
Ingabe kufanele sihambise uhla lwemibhalo lohlelo lokusebenza lwamanje siye kolusha?

warning.enable_tun_with_no_permission: Imodi ye-TUN idinga imvume yomlawuli noma imodi yesevisi, akukho okunikwe amandla, imodi ye-TUN ngeke isebenze kahle.

info.grant_core_permission:
Umongo we-Clash udinga imvume yomlawuli ukuze imodi ye-TUN isebenze kahle, uyanikeza?
Sicela uqaphele ukuthi lo msebenzi udinga ukufakwa kwephasiwedi.
